Name: Alms

+1 Card
+1 Action

$1

You may play an Sauna from your hand.

Name: Black Market
Text:
+$2
Reveal the top 3 cards of the Black Market deck. Play any number of Treasures from your hand. You may buy one of the revealed cards. Put the rest on the bottom of the Black Market deck in any order.
Setup: Make a Black Market deck out of different unused Kingdom cards.

Name: Dismantle
Text: Trash a card from your hand. If it costs $1 or more, gain a cheaper card and a Gold.

Name: Envoy
Text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one. Discard that one and put the rest into your hand.

Name: Governor
Text:
+1 Action
Choose one; you get the version in parentheses: Each player gets +1 (+3) Cards; or each player gains a Silver (Gold); or each player may trash a card from their hand and gain a card costing exactly $1 ($2) more.

Name: Prince
Text: You may set this aside. If you do, set aside an Action card from your hand costing up to $4. At the start of each of your turns, play that Action, setting it aside again when you discard it from play. (Stop playing it if you fail to set it aside on a turn you play it.)

Name: Sauna
Text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
You may play an Avanto from your hand.
While this is in play, when you play a Silver, you may trash a card from your hand.

Name: Stash
Text:
$2
When shuffling, you may look through your remaining deck, and may put this anywhere in the shuffled cards.

Name: Summon
Text: Gain an Action card costing up to $4. Set it aside. If you did, then at the start of your next turn, play it.

Name: Walled Village
Text:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
At the start of Clean-up, if you have this and no more than one other Action card in play, you may put this onto your deck.

Name: Bank
Text: When you play this, it’s worth $1 per Treasure card you have in play (counting this).

Name: Bishop
Text:
+$1
+1 VP 
Trash a card from your hand. +1 VP per $2 it costs (round down). Each other player may trash a card from their hand.

Name: City
Text:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
If there are one or more empty Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are two or more, +1 Buy and +$1

Name: Colony
Text: 10 VP

Name: Contraband
Text:
$3
+1 Buy
When you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can’t buy that card this turn.

Name: Counting House
Text: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Coppers from it, and put them into your hand.

Name: Expand
Text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $3 more than it.

Name: Forge
Text: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in $ of the trashed cards.

Name: Goons
Text:
+1 Buy
+$2
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
While this is in play, when you buy a card, +1VP .

Name: Grand Market
Text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Buy
+$2.
You can’t buy this if you have any Coppers in play.

Name: Hoard
Text:
$2
While this is in play, when you buy a Victory card, gain a Gold.

Name: King's Court
Text: You may play an Action card from your hand three times.

Name: Loan
Text:
$1
When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard it or trash it. Discard the other cards.

Name: Mint
Text:
You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it.
When you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.

Name: Mountebank
Text:
+$2
Each other player may discard a Curse. If they don’t, they gain a Curse and a Copper.

Name: Peddler
Text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+$1
During your Buy phase, this costs $2 less per Action card you have in play, but not less than $0.

Name: Quarry
Text:
$1
While this is in play, Action cards cost $2 less, but not less than $0.

Name: Rabble
Text:
+3 Cards
Each other player reveals the top 3 cards of their deck, discards the revealed Actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back in any order they choose.

Name: Royal Seal
Text:
$2
While this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card onto your deck.

Name: Talisman
Text:
$1
While this is in play, when you buy a non-Victory card costing $4 or less, gain a copy of it.

Name: Trade Route
Text:
+1 Buy
Trash a card from your hand. +$1 per Coin token on the Trade Route mat.
Setup: Add a Coin token to each Victory Supply pile; move that token to the Trade Route mat when a card is gained from that pile.

Name: Vault
Text:
+2 Cards
Discard any number of cards for +$1 each. Each other player may discard 2 cards, to draw a card.

Name: Venture
Text:
$1
When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard the other cards. Play that Treasure.

Name: Watchtower
Text:
Draw until you have 6 cards in hand.
When you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand, to either trash that card or put it onto your deck.

Name: Worker's Village
Text:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
+1 Buy

Name: Academy
Text: When you gain an Action card, +1 Villager.

Name: Acting Troupe
Text:
+4 Villagers
Trash this.

Name: Barracks
Text: At the start of your turn, +1 Action.

Name: Border Guard
Text:
+1 Action
Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and discard the other. If both were Actions, take the Lantern or Horn.

Name: Canal
Text: During your turns, cards cost $1 less, but not less than $0.

Name: Capitalism
Text: During your turns, Actions with +$ amounts in their text are also Treasures.

Name: Cargo Ship
Text:
+$2
Once this turn, when you gain a card, you may set it aside face up (on this). At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

Name: Cathedral
Text: At the start of your turn, trash a card from your hand.

Name: Citadel
Text: The first time you play an Action card during each of your turns, play it again afterward.

Name: City Gate
Text: At the start of your turn, +1 Card, then put a card from your hand onto your deck.

Name: Crop Rotation
Text: At the start of your turn, you may discard a Victory card for +2 Cards.

Name: Ducat
Text:
+1 Coffers
+1 Buy
When you gain this, you may trash a Copper from your hand.

Name: Experiment
Text:
+2 Cards
+1 Action
Return this to the Supply.
When you gain this, gain another Experiment (that doesn’t come with another).

Name: Exploration
Text: At the end of your Buy phase, if you didn’t buy any cards, +1 Coffers and +1 Villager.

Name: Fair
Text: At the start of your turn, +1 Buy.

Name: Flag
Text: When drawing your hand, +1 Card.

Name: Flag Bearer
Text:
+$2
When you gain or trash this, take the Flag.

Name: Fleet
Text: After the game ends, there’s an extra round of turns just for players with this.

Name: Guildhall
Text: When you gain a Treasure, +1 Coffers.

Name: Hideout
Text:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
Trash a card from your hand. If it’s a Victory card, gain a Curse.

Name: Horn
Text: Once per turn, when you discard a Border Guard from play, you may put it onto your deck.

Name: Improve
Text:
+$2
At the start of Clean-up, you may trash an Action card you would discard from play this turn, to gain a card costing exactly $1 more than it.

Name: Innovation
Text: The first time you gain an Action card in each of your turns, you may set it aside. If you do, play it.

Name: Inventor
Text: Gain a card costing up to $4, then cards cost $1 less this turn (but not less than $0).

Name: Key
Text: At the start of your turn, +$1.

Name: Lackeys
Text:
+2 Cards
When you gain this, +2 Villagers.

Name: Lantern
Text: Your Border Guards reveal 3 cards and discard 2. (It takes all 3 being Actions to take the Horn.)

Name: Mountain Village
Text:
+2 Actions
Look through your discard pile and put a card from it into your hand; if you can’t, +1 Card.

Name: Old Witch
Text:
+3 Cards
Each other player gains a Curse and may trash a Curse from their hand.

Name: Pageant
Text: At the end of your Buy phase, you may pay $1 for +1 Coffers.

Name: Patron
Text:
+1 Villager
+$2
When something causes you to reveal this (using the word "reveal"), +1 Coffers.

Name: Piazza
Text: At the start of your turn, reveal the top card of your deck. If it’s an Action, play it.

Name: Priest
Text:
+$2
Trash a card from your hand. For the rest of this turn, when you trash a card, +$2.

Name: Recruiter
Text:
+2 Cards
Trash a card from your hand. +1 Villager per $1 it costs.

Name: Research
Text:
+1 Action
Trash a card from your hand. Per $1 it costs, set aside a card from your deck face down (on this). At the start of your next turn, put those cards into your hand.

Name: Road Network
Text: When another player gains a Victory card, +1 Card.

Name: Scepter
Text: When you play this, choose one: +$2; or replay an Action card you played this turn that’s still in play.

Name: Scholar
Text: Discard your hand. +7 Cards.

Name: Sculptor
Text: Gain a card to your hand costing up to $4. If it’s a Treasure, +1 Villager.

Name: Seer
Text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the ones costing from $2 to $4 into your hand. Put the rest back in any order.

Name: Sewers
Text: When you trash a card other than with this, you may trash a card from your hand.

Name: Silk Merchant
Text:
+2 Cards
+1 Buy
When you gain or trash this, +1 Coffers and +1 Villager.

Name: Silos
Text: At the start of your turn, discard any number of Coppers, revealed, and draw that many cards.

Name: Sinister Plot
Text: At the start of your turn, add a token here, or remove your tokens here for +1 Card each.

Name: Spices
Text:
$2
+1 Buy
When you gain this, +2 Coffers.

Name: Star Chart
Text: When you shuffle, you may pick one of the cards to go on top.

Name: Swashbuckler
Text:
+3 Cards
If your discard pile has any cards in it: +1 Coffers, then if you have at least 4 Coffers tokens, take the Treasure Chest.

Name: Treasure Chest
Text: At the start of your Buy phase, gain a Gold.

Name: Treasurer
Text:
+$3
Choose one: Trash a Treasure from your hand; or gain a Treasure from the trash to your hand; or take the Key.

Name: Villain
Text:
+2 Coffers
Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand discards one costing $2 or more (or reveals they can’t).

Name: Ambassador
Text: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.

Name: Bazaar
Text:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
+$1

Name: Caravan
Text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
At the start of your next turn, +1 Card.

Name: Cutpurse
Text:
+$2
Each other player discards a Copper (or reveals a hand with no Copper).

Name: Embargo
Text:
+$2
Trash this. Add an Embargo token to a Supply pile. (For the rest of the game, when a player buys a card from that pile, they gain a Curse.)

Name: Explorer
Text: You may reveal a Province from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold to your hand. If you don’t, gain a Silver to your hand.

Name: Fishing Village
Text:
+2 Actions
+$1
At the start of your next turn: +1 Action and +$1.

Name: Ghost Ship
Text: +2 Cards. Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from their hand onto their deck until they have 3 cards in hand.

Name: Haven
Text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Set aside a card from your hand face down (under this). At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

Name: Island
Text:
Put this and a card from your hand onto your Island mat.
2 VP

Name: Lighthouse
Text:
+1 Action
Now and at the start of your next turn: +$1.
While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn’t affect you.

Name: Lookout
Text:
+1 Action
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one back on top of your deck.

Name: Merchant Ship
Text: Now and at the start of your next turn: +$2.

Name: Native Village
Text:
+2 Actions
Choose one: Put the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat (you may look at those cards at any time); or put all the cards from your mat into your hand.

Name: Navigator
Text:
+$2
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard them all, or put them back in any order.

Name: Outpost
Text: If this is the first time you played an Outpost this turn, and the previous turn wasn’t yours, then take an extra turn after this one, and you only draw 3 cards for your next hand.

Name: Pearl Diver
Text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.

Name: Pirate Ship
Text: Choose one: +$1 per Coin token on your Pirate Ship mat; or each other player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, trashes one of those Treasures that you choose, and discards the rest, and then if anyone trashed a Treasure you add a Coin token to your Pirate Ship mat.

Name: Salvager
Text:
+1 Buy
Trash a card from your hand. +$1 per $1 it costs.

Name: Sea Hag
Text: Each other player discards the top card of their deck, then gains a Curse onto their deck.

Name: Smugglers
Text: Gain a copy of a card costing up to $6 that the player to your right gained on their last turn.

Name: Tactician
Text: If you have at least one card in hand, discard your hand, and at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards, +1 Action, and +1 Buy.

Name: Treasure Map
Text: Trash this and a Treasure Map from your hand. If you trashed two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Golds onto your deck.

Name: Treasury
Text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+$1
When you discard this from play, if you didn’t buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this onto your deck.

Name: Warehouse
Text:
+3 Cards
+1 Action
Discard 3 cards.

Name: Wharf
Text: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards and +1 Buy.
